CAT - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Type
 
changeBoardAfterUserChoice() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
Resets the board by clearing the selected tiles and updating the neighboring cells.
changePlayerInActive(String, Connection) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GameLobby
Method to change the player from disconnected to active in the game lobby: if he is the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to the player to notify him that he is the only player in the game lobby, if he is not the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to all the players in the game lobby to notify them that the player reconnected, if the game is ended, it sends a message to the player to notify him that the game is ended
changePlayerInDisconnected(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GameLobby
Method to change the player from active to disconnected in the game lobby if he is the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to the player to notify him that he is the only player in the game lobby, if he is not the only player in the game lobby, it sends a message to all the players in the game lobby to notify them that the player disconnected, if the game is ended, it sends a message to the player to notify him that the game is ended
